name: Syracuse Sauce
recipeIngredient: 400 g (13 oz) can of plum tomatoes (drained and roughly chopped),
a few sprigs of flat leaf parsley to garnish.
recipeInstructions: 1. Heat the large frying pan and fry the onion and garlic in a little oil for 3-6 minutes, turning constantly, until soft. Add the courgettes and cook for another 10 minutes.

2. Add the green pepper, tomatoes, olives, anchovies and herbs. Bring to the boil, stirring, then cover the pan and simmer for 15 minutes. Season to taste with salt and pepper and garnish with parsley.
